title: Charley Casserly talks hiring coaches, Charles Davis previews NFC matchups on Wild Card Weekend
itunes:title: Charley Casserly talks hiring coaches, Charles Davis previews NFC matchups on Wild Card Weekend
description:
Bucky Brooks is joined by a few guests on this new episode. First, he talks with NFL Media's Charley Casserly about what to look for when hiring a head coach and general manager (1:19). Next, analyst Charles Davis joins the show, as he previews Wild Card Weekend by diving specifically into the NFC matchups on Sunday (29:37). To wrap up the show, Bucky evaluates the top prospects within the Rose Bowl and Sugar Bowl (48:17).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
